#summary Frequently Asked Questions

=== How to specify a directory for the thumbnail rather then appending a 't' to the image name? ===

For example, the full-size image is `1.jpg` and the thumbnail `thumbs/1.jpg`. You would need to modify the [http://code.google.com/p/slideshow/wiki/Slideshow#Options: replace] option, something like `'replace': [/^(.*)$/, 'thumbs/$1']`. See [http://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference:Global_Objects:RegExp Regular Expressions] reference for more information.
